name: Wyrmwood (FRUTPUNCH, scoutae, Gareth Hudson, klaytronic, HarrisonKerr, Evie Leveille)
name_original: Wyrmwood (FRUTPUNCH, scoutae, Gareth Hudson, klaytronic, HarrisonKerr, Evie Leveille)
description:
Explore and fight through the ruins of an unknown civilization of cicadas as a moth named Fig in this prototype of the Hack n Slash Deck building game Wyrmwood.

  • Create and draft your own deck of cards to do fight against strange creatures in this mysterious new land
  • Fast paced action combat, with the added challenge of a classic deck building game.
  • An aesthetically appealing environment to explore and fight in.

This game is a prototype, this version is a slice of the main mechanics and content that the player will be able to experience.  The team put in a lot of time and effort into the game and we hope that you will enjoy experiencing Wyrmwood!
